data.name: Race Day Rampage
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Race Day Rampage, a Social Arcade Racing game built for streamers and their audience. In the game, you take on the role of Race Director. You pick the tracks, invite your audience and control the race. Cinematic camera controls let you zoom in on specific racers or areas, or zoom out and watch the race from afar. At the same time, the tracks will have various traps that you can control to add to the chaos and influence the race.

Each racer is a real person! Your audience can join through their mobile device (with our companion app), or via the chat interface. The racers get to customize their car, boost with nitro, charge the traps and do other things to be seen. You get to officiate, be the commentator and the camera person, and when the time is right, blow up some cars!

Features:
- Twitch Integration to easily connect your audience to the game
- Track editor to create amazing custom races
- A large variety of ready-made tracks to use out of the box
- A large variety of cars that can be customized to your viewer's individual style
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Race Day Rampage is massively multiplayer arcade racing game. Using a shared screen (your Twitch stream), your entire audience can join the race and play together. Viewers will join directly from chat, or with the mobile app where they can also customize cars, earn currency and track progress.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
